comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I'd say this is Eileen Bowker (1907-2001), who worked as a clerk with the NSW Pubic Works Department Harbour Bridge team. We see her in this other pic (perhaps taken on a different occasion)...the hat and shoes match - www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=389453 The PHM evidently hold her Harbour Bridge archive...this entry includes brief bio notes www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=341641
